title: Video file wont play on blog site?
content: Recently downloaded a video clip, played it on my pc, not a problem, and then uploaded the same clip to a blog site, but it does not play?? All that shows is the opening scene, and nothing else? The audio is working perfectly? I've not had this happen with any other clip I download and then re-upload to another site...can anyone assist with this pleaseÂ ?
creator: 16emtec

title: I need View Image
content: Firefox removed the "View Image" option from the right click menu. You can "open image in new tab" but that is not the same thing and is not what I'm trying to do. The inconvenience of this removal is driving me mad. "View Image" was literally the only thing Firefox had for me over Chrome and I would really like it back. Is there any way to customize or modify Firefox to regain this option? Or if a developer is hearing this, can you bring back that option somehow? I don't want to run an older version of FIrefox just to have it work, especially with the security risk that poses.
creator: winsterton

title: Is there a way to change the background of the suggested search from bright blue?
content: Hello, I'm new to Firefox, and I like it a lot so far, but I'm having a bit of an issue with one thing. When I search something using the url/search bar, search suggestions appear beneath. I like this, and don't want to get rid of the feature, but the fact that it is highlighted in bright blue is pretty hard on my eyes. I was wondering if there is a way to lower the brightness, or make it transparent? Any help would be very much appreciated!
creator: kuriouskat646

title: Yahoo search
content: I've tried to remove a Yahoo forced search with no luck. When you open a new tab and start a new page Yahoo search comes up. How do you permanently remove it?
creator: ssiemers2

title: saving cache to new pc
content: I use an addon "Visited" which highlights sites I have already visited in a different colour. very useful. this is recorded in my cache. I want to save this cache onto a new pc. there used to be a way of doing this. Help.Tony
creator: tbarnok

title: Missing arrows/ cannot scroll through on tabbar to scroll through open tabs
content: Hello. After restoring my previous session in Firefox, I am unable to scroll through my open tabs as the tab bar scroll arrows have disappeared from the tab bar. Is there a way to fix this? I have no extensions/addons/themes installed and even restarted in safe mode, I also fiddled with the toolbars but to no avail. Thanks.
creator: Nate2812
